code: import React from'react';import{useTranslation}from'react-i18next';import'./TermsModal.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TermsModal=_ref=>{let{open,onClose,onAccept}=_ref;const{t}=useTranslation();if(!open)return null;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"terms-modal-overlay",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"terms-modal",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:t('terms_of_use_title')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"terms-modal-content",children:t('terms_of_use').split('\n').map((line,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:line},idx))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"terms-modal-actions",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:onAccept,className:"accept-btn",children:t('Accept')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:onClose,className:"close-btn",children:t('Close')})]})]})});};export default TermsModal;
